synonyms.synonym: CDC14 cell division cycle 14 homolog A

protein.specific_function: Dual-specificity phosphatase. Required for centrosome separation and productive cytokinesis during cell division. May dephosphorylate the APC subunit FZR1/CDH1, thereby promoting APC-FZR1 dependent degradation of mitotic cyclins and subsequent exit from mitosis.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds
